title: Important Guide to Beginner Stock Investing
headline: Learn how to start investing in stocks with the step-by-step guide provided in this free online finance course.
description: If you are a beginner and completely new to investing, this course is for you. No prior financial knowledge is necessary. We have designed this course to provide you with a comprehensive overview of stock investing. You will learn how to set your investment goals, work out the required rate of return and set aside money for investments. In addition, we will discuss the golden rules of investing that will help you become a skillful investor.

courseDescription:
What do you need to consider before investing? We know that investing money is one of the most effective ways to build long-term wealth. So whether you are just launching your start-up, in the middle of your job career, nearing retirement age or are in the middle of your golden years, you should think of your financial future. When it comes to decision-making in investments, nobody is an expert. Even the smartest of investors once started from scratch. While it can seem overwhelming given the breadth of options available, the truth is you don't need to be a financial expert to be successful at it. However, to build the confidence to invest, you need to know the basics. Without this foundation, you risk investing poorly, creating a severe financial loss. As Warren Buffet stated, "Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.‚Äù Students often ask, "We know we have to start investing early, but how can we start? Where to begin?" They also want to know, "What are the main types of investments? What are the core skills to become a smart investor?" We will look carefully at these questions and others to help you begin on the right note.

To help prepare you and potentially reduce your risk, we will help you discover how to set your financial goals, plan your investment strategy and review your timeframe and risk tolerance. We will help you consider where and how to invest your money and provide skills to research the market. Due to recent market events, some investors make rapid investment decisions without considering their long-term financial goals. Therefore, before you make any investing decision, sit down and take an honest look at your entire financial situation, especially if you've never made a financial plan before. The first step to successful investing is figuring out your goals and risk tolerance. Sadly, there is no guarantee that you'll make money from your investments. Nevertheless, get the facts about saving and investing and follow through with an intelligent plan. You will gain financial security over the years and enjoy the benefits of managing your money. Successful investing involves making choices that meet your unique needs today and your financial goals for your future. But of course your circumstances will affect your decisions every step of the way.

Unfortunately, some investors can get caught up in details or become intimidated by some investments and lose sight of their core principles. For that reason, this course will assist new investors to stay grounded in the success principles and will also help support and refresh knowledge for even the most experienced investor. This course is concise to maximize your learning in the shortest time. We equip you with all the essential details for your success. Remember that no prior financial knowledge is necessary to take this course. These topics include a recommended action plan to ease you into moving forward before you invest. Enrol in this course, spare yourself years of studying and potentially save thousands of dollars in losses that many new investors face due to lack of proper education. Become a skillful investor and see the benefits yourself.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.details: Becoming a Skillful Beginner Stock Investor
modules.description: This module covers the important knowledge you need before you start investing. You will learn how to set your investment goals, know your risk tolerance, and achieve higher returns with lower risks, thus creating your path to success as a stock investor.
topics: Becoming a Skilful Beginner Stock Investor - Learning Outcomes

Are You a Trader or an Investor?
How to Invest Safely and Sustainably

  • Lesson Summary

    • Four areas of personal financemanagementbeforeinvesting. * Know your financial starting point, * manage your debt and credit rating, * Do you have enough cash for emergencies? and * Sort out your super.
    • Use the Investment Product Checklist (Resource) to avoid investment scams.
    • The golden rules of investing are 1. Start with a financial goal.
      2. Understand your investments.
      3. Analysis.
      4. Plan.
      5. Do not rely on good luck.
    • Investment priority.1. Protect your capital, 2. Meet your financial goals, 3. Maximum returns and 4. Risk and money management. 
    • Set up your investment goals using SFA Investment Goals Checklist (Resource).
    • Determine the required monthly investment amount.
    • Work out the required minimum rate of return for your investments.
    • Know your risk tolerance. Two expectations affect your resources. 1. Your financial goals and time frame. 2. Achieve your emotional stability
    • Investment terms and risk (Resource).
